amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the CAO of the House of Representatives from making any payments from any Members' Representational Allowance for the leasing of a vehicle, excluding mobile district offices and short-term vehicle rentals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-426 to prohibit the CAO of the House of Representatives from making any payments from any Members' representational allowance for the leasing of a vehicle, excluding mobile district offices and short-term vehicle rentals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 221 (Roll no. 188).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Nugent.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 221 (Roll no. 188).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
